00009 using namespace std;
00018 void bashScript::getTime(string *dateList)
00019 {
00020         int Day,Month,Year,Hour;
00021         struct tm *Sys_T = NULL;
00022         time_t Tval = 0;
00023         Tval = time(NULL);
00024         Tval -= 3600; //1 saat çıkar
00025         Sys_T = localtime(&Tval);
00026         //cout << "bok" << Tval << endl;
00027         Day=Sys_T->tm_mday;
00028         Month=Sys_T->tm_mon+1;
00029         Year=1900 + Sys_T->tm_year;
00030         Hour = Sys_T -> tm_hour;
00031         
00032         stringop strop;
00033         dateList[0] = strop.itoa(Year,10);
00034         if (Month < 10)
00035                 dateList[1] = "0" + strop.itoa(Month,10);
00036         else
00037                 dateList[1] = strop.itoa(Month,10);
00038         if (Day < 10)
00039                 dateList[2] = "0" + strop.itoa(Day,10);
00040         else
00041                 dateList[2] = strop.itoa(Day,10);
00042         if (Hour < 10)
00043                 dateList[3] = "0" + strop.itoa(Hour,10);
00044         else
00045                 dateList[3] = strop.itoa(Hour,10);
00046 }

00051 string bashScript::getDataFiles(string destDir)
00052 {
00053         
00054         string *dateList = new string[4];
00055         getTime(dateList);
00056         
00057         string lfc_ls_command = "lfc-ls /grid/trgridd/kandilli/barbar.koeri.boun.edu.tr/wData/";
00058 
00059         for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00060         {
00061                 lfc_ls_command = lfc_ls_command + dateList[i] + "/";
00062         }
00063         //cout << lfc_ls_command << endl;
00064         //for i in `ls -b $FILEPATH`; do     echo $i ; done 
00065         //lfc-ls /grid/trgridd/kandilli/barbar.koeri.boun.edu.tr/wData/
00066         string lcg_cp_command = "for i in ";
00067         //lcg_cp_command = lcg_cp_command + "`" + lfc_ls_command + "`; do echo $i ; done";
00068         lcg_cp_command = lcg_cp_command + "`" + lfc_ls_command + "`; do "; 
00069         lcg_cp_command = lcg_cp_command + "lcg-cp --vo trgridd lfn:/grid/trgridd/kandilli/barbar.koeri.boun.edu.tr/wData/" ;
00070         lcg_cp_command = lcg_cp_command + dateList[0] + "/" + dateList[1] + "/" + dateList[2] + "/" + dateList[3] + "/" + "$i ";
00071         lcg_cp_command = lcg_cp_command + "file:" + destDir + "/$i ; done";
00072         
00073         return lcg_cp_command;  
00074         
00075 }
